translations: 说唱歌手；敲门者；叩击物

sentences.sentence: Spears, 24, married rapper Kevin Federline, 28, in 2004.
sentences.translation: 24岁的布兰妮和28岁的凯文·费德林于2004年结婚。

sentences.sentence: This whole-country-rental idea started with rapper Snoop Dogg.
sentences.translation: 这个“出租国家”的灵感得益于美国说唱歌手“史努比狗狗”。

sentences.sentence: Some rapper boys from South London came up and hugged him once.
sentences.translation: 曾有一次几个伦敦南部来的饶舌歌手和他拥抱。
